comments.html: Excellent term, my friend! My original take was about people specifically trying to be contrarian but I love how you expanded the idea to include people trying to create engagement with poor posts or unclear ideas.
comments.name: Tom Hollingsworth

comments.html:
You really shouldn't include in this discussion people trying to create engagement. That could be your worst mistake. You should think about you career.

And you should not bait nerds like me into this kind of logic honeypots... I just cannot resist.

Self-referential joking aside, thanks for exposing this behaviour pattern, it was not obvious to me.
comments.name: Michele Bergonzoni
